MapBiomas Indonesia menyampaikan bahwa l: MapBiomas Indonesia conveyed that the land cover dynamics shown in Collection 3.0 will strengthen data and maps of land cover classes relevant to the Peatland and Mangrove Restoration Agency (BRGM).
Berupa data dan peta area terbakar di In: FIRE 1.0 presents data and maps of burned areas in Indonesia throughout 2013–2023, supplemented with analyses by each land cover class found in MapBiomas Indonesia’s Collection 2.0.
Mapbiomas Alerta: Pelatihan validasi ale: MapBiomas Alerta: Deforestation alert validation training
MapBiomas Indonesia melatih 10 calon val: MapBiomas Indonesia trained 10 prospective validators projected to validate every deforestation alert in Indonesia in 2024.
Menampilkan dinamika tutupan lahan Indon: Displaying land cover dynamics in Indonesia, this platform provides land cover maps, statistics and transitions, as well as overlays with land uses and concessions.
Menyajikan data dan peta area terbakar d: FIRE presents data and maps of burned areas in Indonesia by optimizing the Google Earth Engine and a deep learning approach to publicly available satellite imagery.
Setiap alert deforestasi diverifikasi, l: Every deforestation alert is verified, then validated through the latest high-resolution satellite imagery, to present authentic deforestation data and maps.
